text:
- When the camera is off--
- We're still on.

- ♪ It's the truth ♪
- ♪ The truth ♪

- ♪ The truth with Ruth ♪
- ♪ With Ruth and Ava, too ♪

- ♪ It's true ♪
- ♪ That's me and you ♪
♪ On the truth ♪

Looks like
we have just enough time
to answer a question for you.

How do you bounce back
after a mistake?

Well, mistakes happen,
and with whatever you're doing,

you're going to have times
where you succeed
and when you fail.
Like when I play bass,

sometimes I have
a hard time getting a riff,
but then I try to remember

it takes time and practice
to get something right.
Yeah, practice makes perfect.

The more I practice
the stuff I love,
like soccer and martial arts,
the better I get.
Well, that's awesome, Ava.

And my parents
always say fail forward,
to learn from my mistakes,

and sometimes even
the mistakes you make

can lead to something
even greater.

Did you know that
chocolate chip cookies

- were invented by mistake?
- What?

Who knows what great things
can come from a mistake?

Hmm. Now I feel hungry.
I think we have enough time

- to hit up crafty.
- Let's do it.

We'll catch you next time
on "The Truth With Ruth."
And Ava.

Keep watching
"Sydney To The Max"...

Both:
On Disney Channel.

Ruth: We got to turn off
the camera, come on.
Okay, okay. Bye!
